name: Big Maan in a Tiny World
name_original: Big Maan in a Tiny World
description:
Big Maan (no relation), a tiny alien with big dreams, is trapped in somebody's walls and needs to get out! With the help of his trusty Size Gun (Patent Pending), Hector,  and YOU he'll be free in no time!

This is a submission for the MashUp Games Game Jam, made in 72 hours.

ASD and Space to move, left and right click to shoot, F for full screen and R to restart.

Good luck, have fun and most importantly, thank you.
